Content: *p70963a0232*2	  answer all questions. write your answers in the spaces provided.some questions must be answered with a cross in a box . if you change your mind about an answer, put a line through the box  and then mark your new answer with a cross .1	 bacteriostatic and bactericidal antibiotics are used to treat bacterial infections.
